resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107393</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107393</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading for relevance in literature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ablesen für Bedeutung in der Literatur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture pour la pertinence en littérature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Leitura para a relevância na literatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leggendo per l'attinenza in letteratura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση για τη σχετικότητα στη λογοτεχνία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura para la importancia en literatura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A unit-length instructional plan for using graphic organizers to promote active reading of novels, using The Count of Monte Cristo as an example.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Maßeinheit-Länge anweisender Plan für das 
Verwenden der graphischen Organisatoren, um aktiven Messwert der 
Romane mit dem Zählimpuls von Monte Cristo als Beispiel zu fördern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan d'instruction d'unité-longueur pour 
l'usage des organisateurs graphiques pour favoriser la lecture active 
des romans, en utilisant le compte de Monte Cristo comme exemple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta instrutiva do unidade-comprimento para 
usar organizers gráficos promover a leitura ativa das novelas, usando
a contagem de Monte Cristo como um exemplo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma didattico di unità-lunghezza per 
usando gli organizzatori grafici per promuovere lettura attiva dei 
romanzi, usando il conteggio di Monte Cristo come esempio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα εκπαιδευτικό σχέδιο μονάδα-μήκους για τη 
χρησιμοποίηση των γραφικών διοργανωτών για να προωθήσει την 
ενεργό ανάγνωση των μυθιστορημάτων, που χρησιμοποιούν την 
αρίθμηση Monte Cristo για παράδειγμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan educacional de la unidad-longitud para 
usar a organizadores gráficos para promover la lectura activa de 
novelas, usando la cuenta de Monte Cristo como ejemplo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SUZANNE MICALLEF
FN:SUZANNE MICALLEF
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107393</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/reading-for-relevance-in-literature</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
